roleset.name: prove, justify
roleset.note: SUBSTANTIATE-V NOTES: More common in the negative adjectival 'unsubstantiated' (eg rumors). (from substantiate.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Mr. Lewis said [the company]-1 gave the Consumer Affairs department ``volumes of documents'' *trace*-1 to substantiate its statements, and made ``every effort to comply'' with all the agency's policies.
